person_say: I’ve been lacking motivation to study lately, and I have no interest in it. Are there any ways to boost my study drive?
animal_say: Sounds tough! What do you find most challenging about studying? Let's find ways to rekindle that drive!

person_say: I think the most challenging part is just feeling uninterested and overwhelmed. I really want to find ways to motivate myself again.
animal_say: Feeling overwhelmed is common! Have you tried breaking tasks into smaller chunks or setting specific goals?

person_say: I haven't really tried breaking tasks into smaller chunks. That sounds like a good idea! I would love to set specific goals to help me stay focused.
animal_say: Bizy can assist with goal setting and time management. Shall I connect you with her?

person_say: Yes, connecting with Bizy sounds great! I would love to get help with goal setting and time management.
animal_say: Awesome! Let’s buzz over to Bizy for some fantastic goal-setting and time management tips!
